creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: V-shaped border/corner band fragment; cross stitch embroidery of central black band with red, white, green and yellow geometric shapes, flanked with black scrolls with green, yellow, red and purple background colors; back with purple, gold and red floral print; crocheted edging on outside of V with beaded tassels in red, black, white, yellow, green and purple
title: Border fragment
